timeline.bodyText: Do we allow Division to be null?
timeline.author: timmylicheng

replies.bodyText: No, we don't allow null Divison in real env.
replies.author: GlenGeng

timeline.bodyText: Any way to guarantee division is not null?
timeline.author: timmylicheng

replies.bodyText: You won't get a null, instead, the call will throw a GroupMismatchException in this situation.
replies.author: GlenGeng
